name: Survivioon
description:
A 2D survival game prototype inspired by "Don't Starve Together".

It features Inventory (with Tooltips and Drag & Drop), Equipment, Building (and smashing of buildings to recover building materials), Crafting, Menus with Recipes, Hunting, Random Map Generation with 2 "biomes", Camera Zoom in and out with mouse wheel

This was my first ever own Unity project!

NOTE

The tooltips texts are better readable with game in fullscreen
